item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @Fir3_Flam3 Fir3 Flam3
item.description:
@Fir3_Flam3 wrote:

Break the whole thing down.

if (FightType != 3) { TotalExp = (double)(4 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID); }

else { if (FightType != 3 && NPCID == 1612) { TotalExp = (double)(200 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID); addSkillXP(50, 18); } 

else if (FightType == 3 && NPCID == 1612) {
TotalExp = (double)(66 * hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength);
addSkillXP(50, 18);
}

You can see the second chunk has two { and only one }. Just put another } under the last } in the second chunk.

Although I’m not totally sure about elses, I normally use else ifs.

Read full topic
